conclusion: We need to use the properties of angles and triangles in the given figure to solve the problem.
The top angle of the cross section of the wedge-shaped glass is 30 degrees.
The angle of incidence at point S is 45 degrees.
The angle of reflection at point S is 45 degrees because the angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection.
Since the angle of incidence is 45 degrees, triangle SBO is an isosceles triangle with BO = OS.
Since BO = OS, triangle SBO is an isosceles triangle.
